From: "Markus Kohler" <kohler@...>

Hi,
I'm trying to test some Java code that uses JNI to access some native
Windows NT functions. 
I'm running into trouble when loading the library. 
When running the test using the swing GUI it works only every second time. 
The problem is that it claims that the library (dll) is already loaded. 

For loading the dll I added the line 
System.loadLibrary("myLib");

to setup()

Does anybody know how to detect that the library is loaded ?

Regards,
Markus

Markus Kohler,                               t e c m a t h
